name: Cumulus Crossing
description:
As the benevolent Wind, escort aimless airships to safety. Made in 72 hours for the ZenoJam Game Jam.

Known Issues: No UI to tell you to restart if you hit a mine on Level 2. Just hit R to restart! Comment if you find another bug!

PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN TO AVOID VISUAL BUGS

Coding, game design, and some art by norstin(https://norstin.itch.io/).

Sound effects, and some art and game design by tay_lo(https://tay-lo.itch.io/).

Assets Used:

- Airship Sprite

- Explosion Animation

- Sky Background
